content.question: Originally Hagia Sophia may have lacked figural imagery either because the builders feared making graven images or because

choices.label: they desired to focus the attention of visitors on the architecture and surface decoration
they ran out of money to finish their planned program of decoration
Emperor Justinian wanted to outshine all other aspects of the building when he appeared
Christians had not yet developed a tradition of figural imagery for church decoration

content.answer: they desired to focus the attention of visitors on the architecture and surface decoration
